Defines the whitelist and blacklist for a producer node. Takes a JSON object containing whitelist and blacklist information.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
